improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: Unlock unparalleled weather intelligence with our advanced Forecast Weather API. Secure a precise weather forecast for *any* specified duration, covering up to the full 14 days in advance, offering superior flexibility for shorter or longer requests within this range. This comprehensive API delivers detailed daily and hourly weather information, essential astronomy data, and critical weather alerts, establishing itself as the definitive, most adaptable source for accurate, up-to-the-minute weather predictions.
name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api
